original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Whereas earlier major protests were quelled by Iran's government, the current protest has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Where earlier protests focused on election results or economic issues, the current protest, other than more rights for women, has one demand: get rid of the Islamic Republic.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Earlier major protests were violently stopped by Iran's government. || These protests were about election results or economic problems. || The current protest is about getting more rights for women and the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Earlier major protests focused on election results or economic problems and were violently stopped by Iran’s government. || In addition to increasing women’s rights, the current protest has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.

original: Football fans around the world may find some apprehensions about going to the World Cup in Qatar because of the alcohol laws concerning consuming alcohol in public places, but World Cup organizers announce the creation of designated "sobering up" zones as a way to make fans feel safe and comfortable while attending the World Cup.
simplified: Football fans around the world may find some apprehensions about going to the World Cup in Qatar because of the alcohol laws, but World Cup organizers say that they will have "sobering up" zones where people will be told not to drink alcohol while watching the games.

simplified: Some football fans might be nervous about going to the World Cup in Qatar because of the alcohol laws, but World Cup organizers are setting up areas where people can drink alcohol so that fans feel safe and comfortable.

original: On 3 November 2022, the British Foreign Secretary James Cleverly announced that the UK and Mauritius had decided to begin negotiations on sovereignty over the British Indian Ocean Territory, taking into account the recent international legal proceedings.

original: Once inaugurated in January 2023, she will become the first female Governor of Massachusetts as well as the first openly lesbian woman and third openly LGBT person (after Kate Brown and Jared Polis) to take office as governor of a U.S. state.
simplified: She will become the first female Governor of Massachusetts in 2023. || She will also be the first openly lesbian woman and third openly LGBT person to take office as governor of a U.S. state.

original: However, upon Flynn's apparent success in securing sufficient backing to become council president, Arroyo released a statement that acted as an informal concession of sorts, giving strong praise to Flynn's kindness and work ethic, and declaring that he looked forward, "to seeing how he utilizes those great qualities in this leadership role."
